name: A Matter of Time (itch)
description:
Defeat several different bosses and try to see if you can find its final form!

Made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 37. The theme was "One Room". You can find the entry on this page.

This is the first game I finish and publish using Unity. I'm currently writing about my views on the game engine. It was a fun experience and this game will be constantly updated.

Share your thoughts on the comments below. They are super welcome to me!
